name: Easy Mango Salad
author: abcgirl
summary: The salad ingredients came from a cooking class I went to, but the dressing came from a friend. Make sure you use firm mangos or they will be impossible to julienne.
ingredients: 2  firm green mangoes - peeled, pitted, and cut into matchsticks
¼  red bell pepper, thinly sliced
3 sprigs cilantro, or more to taste, leaves removed and stems discarded
directions: Mix mangoes, onion, red bell pepper, and cilantro leaves together in a bowl
Whisk lime juice, fish sauce, and brown sugar together in a separate bowl until the sugar is dissolved; pour over the mango mixture and toss to coat
